roleset.name: initiate
roleset.note: BAPTIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'baptize' based on sentences in brown. (from baptize.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: thing being initiated in (a discipline, school of thought, society, etc.)

example.name: passive, with Arg2-in (-)
example.text: The novelist who [*T*-2] has been badly baptized [*-1]in psychoanalysisoften gives us the impression that since all men must have an Oedipus complexall men must have the same faces .

roleset.name: give a first or christian name to a person
roleset.note: BAPTIZE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from baptize.02-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: He had already been studying the Bible ; he knew the fundamentals , andafter [*] studying with Fletcher for a time he approached Rector , announcedthat [he]*-1 wanted [*-2] to be baptized [*-1] and that was that .
